Hospital.Controllers
Class DiagnosisController

java.lang.Object
  Hospital.Controllers.DiagnosisController

public class DiagnosisController
extends Object

The DiagnosisController is used by DoctorControllers to perform diagnosis-related actions, including:

  • Creating diagnoses
  • Approving/disapproving diagnoses
  • Determining the type of a diagnosis
  • Finding available doctors to ask a second opinion from
To create a DiagnosisController, the LoginController of a logged in Doctor is required.

Method Detail

enterDiagnosis

public String enterDiagnosis(String factoryName,
                             PublicArgument[] args,
                             LoginInfo secondOpinion)
                      throws ArgumentNotAnsweredException,
                             NoPersonWithNameAndRoleException,
                             NoOpenedPatientFileException,
                             PatientIsDischargedException,
                             NotLoggedInException,
                             NotAFactoryException,
                             ArgumentConstraintException,
                             WrongArgumentListException,
                             ArgumentIsNullException
This creates a diagnosis in the system with the given Arguments

Parameters:
factoryName - The type of diagnosis to be created
args - The arguments needed to instantiate the diagnosis
secondOpinion - the LoginInfo of the doctor to ask a second opinion from
Returns:
The details of the created diagnosis
Throws:
ArgumentNotAnsweredException - Empty arguments got passed.
NoPersonWithNameAndRoleException - The name of the second opinion doctor was not found in the world
NoOpenedPatientFileException - the doctor currently has no patientfile opened to enter this diagnosis in
PatientIsDischargedException - the patient for which we're entering this diagnosis is already discharged
NotLoggedInException - the doctor is not logged in
NotAFactoryException - the given factoryName did not lead to an existing type of diagnosis
ArgumentConstraintException - if this happens, the patientfile was somehow closed during the execution of this function
WrongArgumentListException - the given list of arguments was invalid
ArgumentIsNullException - the given second opinion doctor was null

approveDiagnosis

public String approveDiagnosis(DiagnosisInfo diag)
                        throws PatientIsDischargedException,
                               NoOpenedPatientFileException,
                               NotLoggedInException,
                               InvalidDiagnosisException,
                               CannotDoException
Used to approve a diagnosis to which a second opinion was asked

Parameters:
diag - the DiagnosisInfo of the diagnosis to be approved
Returns:
details about the diagnosis
Throws:
PatientIsDischargedException - the patient the doctor is working on is already discharged
NoOpenedPatientFileException - the doctor has no patientfile opened
NotLoggedInException - the doctor is not logged in
InvalidDiagnosisException - the diagnosis could not be found
CannotDoException - this command could somehow not be executed, even though it was just created

disapproveDiagnosis

public String disapproveDiagnosis(DiagnosisInfo diag,
                                  String details)
                           throws CannotChangeException,
                                  WrongArgumentListException,
                                  ArgumentNotAnsweredException,
                                  NoPersonWithNameAndRoleException,
                                  NoOpenedPatientFileException,
                                  InvalidDiagnosisException,
                                  NotLoggedInException,
                                  NotAFactoryException,
                                  ArgumentConstraintException
Disapproves a diagnosis

Parameters:
diag - the diagnosis to disapprove
details - no use
Returns:
the details of the new diagnosis made to correct the original
Throws:
CannotChangeException - if this happens, a newly created argument was somehow already answered
NoOpenedPatientFileException - the doctor has no patientfile opened
NotLoggedInException - the doctor is not logged in
InvalidDiagnosisException - the diagnosis could not be found
WrongArgumentListException - the arguments to the corrected diagnosis somehow became invalid
ArgumentNotAnsweredException - the arguments to the corrected diagnosis somehow became invalid
NoPersonWithNameAndRoleException - somehow something went wrong in finding the original doctor
NotAFactoryException - somehow the "Diagnosis with secondOpinion"-factory disappeared from the world
ArgumentConstraintException - the arguments to the corrected diagnosis somehow became invalid

getAvailableSecondOpinionDoctors

public LoginInfo[] getAvailableSecondOpinionDoctors()
                                             throws NotLoggedInException
Gets a list of doctors available to a ask a second opinion from

Returns:
an array of LoginInfo's containing the information about available doctors
Throws:
NotLoggedInException - the doctor is not logged in

getAvailableDiagnosisFactories

public String[] getAvailableDiagnosisFactories()
                                        throws NotLoggedInException
Used to find all possible types of diagnosis

Returns:
an array of strings containing the names of all types of diagnosis-factory
Throws:
NotLoggedInException - the doctor is not logged in

getDiagnosisArguments

public PublicArgument[] getDiagnosisArguments(String factoryName)
                                       throws NotLoggedInException,
                                              NotAFactoryException
Gets the required arguments to a type of diagnosis

Parameters:
factoryName - the type of diagnosis
Returns:
an array of PublicArguments which, when answered, can be used to create a diagnosis of the given type
Throws:
NotLoggedInException - the doctor is not logged in
NotAFactoryException - the given type of diagnosis does not exist in this world
